title: 91/315/EEC: Council Decision of 26 June 1991 setting up a programme of options specific to the remote and insular nature of Madeira and the Azores (Poseima)
header:
COUNCIL DECISION  of 26 June 1991  setting up a programme of options specific to the remote and insular nature of Madeira and the Azores (Poseima)  (91/315/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. An action programme for Madeira and the Azores, known as Poseima (Programme of options specific to the remote and insular nature of Madeira and the Azores) and set out in the Annex, is hereby established. This programme shall cover regulatory measures and financial commitments.
2. Within the context of the powers conferred upon it by the Treaty, the Council shall adopt the provisions necessary for the execution of this programme and invite the Commission to submit the relevant proposals as soon as possible.

The financial resources required to implement the measures relating to agricultural structures, energy and the craft industry appearing in this programme shall be determined in the annual budgetary procedures.
This Decision shall take effect on 1 July 1991.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 26 June 1991.
For the Council
The President
R. STEICHEN
